item.title: lsusb and chroot in anaconda.. Is usbfs mounted in anaconda %post installation ?
item.description: **T**he binary ‘/sbin/lsusb’ in a chroot-ed environment have problems running properly. I have not checked this in a manually created chroot environment or using tools like ‘mock’. The scenario is as following : We were trying to check the output of ‘lsusb’ in the %post section of a kickstart installation. I had specified ‘noreboot’ in the kickstart file so the machine will wait for the user to manually reboot the machine.
